special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Silundi enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[b]2 Defense[/b] Stage 2
Creatures you don’t control get -1/-0.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Noncreature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
